message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be a valuable asset to you. I'm willing to part with it for $2,300,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay up to $1,200,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, the value of this product to the right buyer is significantly higher. I could consider letting it go for $2,000,000.
Alice, thank you for considering my position. I am still very interested in the product, but I can only commit to a purchase at $1,600,000.
